about_the_game:
Magic Book

This Magic-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Spells, tricks and wonders of the imagination!

Grab your wand and cape and get ready to perform spectacles out of this world!

Contents

The Magic book unlocks the following images:
  • Party Tricks - 45x80
  • Necromancer - 50x63
  • Battle Mage - 54x101
  • Power Levels - 55x75
  • Released - 59x115
  • Spell Icon - 64x64
  • Bunny in a Hat - 76x95
  • Charm - 84x37
  • Fireball - 89x60
  • Spelltome - 94x128
  • Fortune Telling - 105x120
  • Fire Potion - 114x114
  • Lost dorr - 120x135
  • Witchcraft - 121x109
  • Obelisk - 121x132
  • Summoning - 122x122
  • Card Tricks - 130x120
  • Hats - 168x87
  • Casting - 178x134
  • Stage Magician - 202x202

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Magic Pack

  • Processor: Intel i5

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
